channel.title: 2006Remade [Runesource/Azure]
channel.description:
The base is Runesource/Azure.
Looking for a content and website developer. If you wish to apply, please use the following layout:
Content developer: [CODE]- Name: - Age - Past work - Proof of past work - Experience - Skype[/CODE]
Website developer: [CODE]- Name: - Age - Past work - Proof of past work - Experience - SQL/MYQL/Intergration & other shit related to that? - Skype[/CODE]

item.title: 2006Remade [Runesource/Azure]
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:18, topic:523998”]- Name: Landon

  • Age: 16
  • Past work: A little Froyo, some Vulcan. Not done much lately.
  • Proof of past work: Never released anything, so I’ve none.
  • Experience: About 4 years overall, didn’t get serious until this past year.
  • Skype: Arham can supply it or you can pm me for it.[/quote]

We’re currently not looking for anyone more content developer’s, but if we do, I’ll consider you!

Read full topic
